author: Lauren Kaori Gurley, Jason Koebler
title: Whole Foods Employees Are Staging a Nationwide 'Sick-Out'
description: Workers say they will strike Tuesday because the Amazon subsidiary has failed to prioritize their safety during a period of record sales.
content:
Whole Foods employees are planning to strike on Tuesday to protest the lack of protections offered to workers during the coronavirus pandemicthe first national collective action led by workers at the company since it was founded in 1980.
